file_content.text:
I have a terrible feeling, Max. I think that our work on behalf of the Hutts is the cause behind these groundquakes. What's more, I believe we are destroying the planet.
I've set up sensors to track the effects of these drilling lasers on the planet's core. If I'm right--and I'm sure I am--we could use the compiled data to save Makeb.
See you soon. -Arne
